name: Tropical Boost
description:
Tropical Boost is a hurricane inspired endless runner that utilizes Unreal vehicle physics. The Player must drive as long as they can.

HOW TO PLAY

Arrow Keys - Drive
Z - Boost
X - Fire Guns

Gasoline [Green Bar] - Your car is constantly running out of gasoline! if you run out, you lose!
Gasoline Barrels - Driving into these destroys your car and ends the session! Shoot these with your guns to safely pass, or more importantly, boost through them to collect more gasoline!
Boost [Blue Bar] - Boost is obtained by driving over geysers!
Ammunition [ Red Bar] - Ammunition is refilled by collecting green tokens!
